channel.title: 508 weird problem
channel.description: i made my own 508 and it had working command like ::admin ::banuser but the next day when i turn my 508 to play with friend and i tryed to used commands it didn't work like ::item ::kick ::banuser ::admin but it was working a few days ago and i didn't change/edit anything with my commands

I really would, it will drive me insane(no joke) like seriously it’s really really bad

item.title: 508 weird problem
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("kill") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x") || p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("username")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestGFX(1624, 0); p2.appendHit(9999999, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

change it to that and see what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 weird problem
item.dc:creator: @anc13ntpk3r anc13ntpk3r
item.description:
@anc13ntpk3r wrote:

ya lol i have same thing look

if (cmd[0].equals("kill") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sl1mboy1")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestGFX(1624, 0); p2.appendHit(999999, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sl1mboy1")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("givemod") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sl1mboy1")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("demote") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("sl1mboy1")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 0; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("kill") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestGFX(1624, 0); p2.appendHit(9999999, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("hail") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestAnim(7197, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("givemod") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("demote") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 0; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

item.title: 508 weird problem
item.dc:creator: @anc13ntpk3r anc13ntpk3r
item.description:
@anc13ntpk3r wrote:

here, you can have my commands.

if (cmd[0].equals("kill") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestGFX(1624, 0); p2.appendHit(9999999, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("hail") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.requestAnim(7197, 0); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("givemod") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("demote") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("3m0 f0x")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 0; p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }
